H0.text: Which singer had a 2008 number one hit with the song 'Take A Bow'. Beyoncé

H1.text: Which singer had a 2008 number one hit with the song 'Take A Bow'. Katy Perry

H2.text: Which singer had a 2008 number one hit with the song 'Take A Bow'. Lady Gaga

H3.text: Which singer had a 2008 number one hit with the song 'Take A Bow'. RiRi

A4.text: Reloaded spawned four new tracks, two of which—'Disturbia' and 'Take a Bow'—topped the Billboard Hot 100.
